actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 96-793.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.
Measure passed House, amended, roll call #109 (323-0).
Referred to Senate Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary (without written report).

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for designation of the week of September 21-27, 1980 as "National Cystic Fibrosis Week".

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service with amendment, H. Rept. 96-793) Designates the week of September 27, 1980, as "National Cystic Fibrosis Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to designate the third week of September as "National Cystic Fibrosis Week".
A joint resolution to provide for designation of the week of September 21-27, 1980 as "National Cystic Fibrosis Week".
